sense.gloss: one's post, one's position, one's station, one's place of duty
one's round, one's beat, one's route

sdata.j: どんなことがあっても|↑持↑↓も↓ち↑場|↑↓ば↓を↑離↑↓はな↓れてはならない。
sdata.e: In no case are you to leave your post.

sdata.j: ↑交替↑↓こうたい↓するまで|↑持↑↓も↓ち↑場|↑↓ば↓を↑離↑↓はな↓れるな。
sdata.e: Remain at your post until relieved.
